author: ETA PRIME
description:
The Lenovo Legion Go 2 just went full-Steam! In this video, we install and test official SteamOS 3.8 running natively on the Z2 Extreme-powered Legion Go 2, and the performance results are shockingly good.
We’ll benchmark top AAA titles like Cyberpunk 2077, The Witcher 3, DOOM: The Dark Ages, Spider-Man 2, Elden Ring, Borderlands 4, and more — all running directly under SteamOS 3.8. With full TDP control, power profiles, HDR, and VRR support, the Legion Go 2 is shaping up to be one of the best SteamOS handhelds ever built.
If Lenovo and Valve keep this partnership momentum, the Legion Go 2 could easily become the ultimate SteamOS gaming device.
